To our loyal current clients: We love you! We do not like it when companies treat new customers with discount offers better than their loyal existing customers too! We have great news for you, purchase any new Special Offer deal today and we will add on '1' free month of service to the new product for every year you have been a customer! Please be aware, you can not cancel or transfer from an existing TurnKey service at these Special Offer discount rates - but you can order a new service on these discount promotions and enjoy extra free months of service as a bonus for your continued loyalty!
